pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video presents a fast-paced, first-person view of a journey through a lush, green landscape. The camera moves along a dirt path, flanked by vibrant grass and trees. In the background, houses are visible on a hillside under a sunny, blue sky.
